title: Is the iPhone 12 Mini too small? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s way to small for me I’ve always have had big hands I can’t even use the iPhone 11 Pro Max properly so the iPhone 12 mini would be way to small for me. But it could be beneficial to the people with small hands I have a friend who’s 5’0 tall and she has really small hands so this phone could be beneficial to her. she’s always wanted a smaller iPhone she doesn’t like the se models either. so this would work for her she smiled and got excited when I showed her the revel so I see some upsides to the iPhone 12 mini. it might be to small for some and just right for others.

As someone who has been reluctant to upgrade from my 2016 first generation iPhone SE, my question is not if the iPhone 12 Mini is too small, but if it is too big. The dimensions of the iPhone 12 Mini are 5.18 in x 2.53 in x 0.29 in, with a 5.4 inch screen.Compare this to the 2016 iPhone SE’s dimensions of 4.87 in x 2.31 in x 0.30 in, with a 4 inch screen. As someone still comfortable with the 4 inch iPhone series, the slightly larger (and slightly thinner) iPhone 12 Mini may be a great upgrade, and certainly not too small. I will need to see it out in the wild before making that decision.
